name: WAX - Extreme Sports Game for the iPhone (Canceled)
blurb: An iPhone App that allows extreme athletes to compete with one another in real time, all the time.

rewards.reward: Exclusive Private Beta Access! - \r\n\r\nWith only one buck, you can be part of something amazing. Our private beta access will be a 3 month period that is only open to our backers. Your feedback will greatly have an impact on Wax. //Your name will also be placed on the soon to be famous backers page on our website.

Wax Logo Decal & Private Beta Access! - Put it on your skateboard, surfboard, skimboard, wakeboard or your moms cat (just kidding about the last one). Plus+ you get Reward #1 - Private Beta Access (add $3 for international shipping)
Personalized Thank You. We have designed a personalized thank you where you're #1 on the Wax leaderboard. You also get a logo decal and Private beta access. (add $3 for international shipping)

Wax trucker hat (you don't have to be a trucker) Going to be a sunny summer so help Wax help you keep the sun off your face. Plus+ you also get the Wax logo decal and Reward #1 - Private beta access. (add $10 for international shipping)

Special Edition Kickstart/Wax T-shirt (Gray) -- This T-shirt is a one of a kind and can be worn to nearly any event. Wear it to the skatepark, a night out on the town or your sister's wedding. This T-shirt will look amazing on you. Plus+ You also get Reward #2 = Wax Logo Decal and and Reward #1 = Private Beta Access! (add $10 for international shipping)

Special Edition Kickstart/Wax T-shirt (Navy)-- This T-shirt is a one of a kind and can be worn to nearly any event. Wear it to the skatepark, a night out on the town or your sister's wedding. This T-shirt will look amazing on you. Plus+ You also get Reward #2 = Wax Logo Decal and and Reward #1 = Private Beta Access! (add $10 for international shipping)

Premium style Classic Wax t-shirt (gray). This t-shirt is made on American Apparels best material and simply shows off the beautiful Wax logo. You also get a Wax Logo Decal and Private Beta Access! (add $10 for international shipping)

VIP Wax - Brace yourself! -- You can get the special edition Kickstarter/Wax T-shirt in BOTH NAVY & GRAY, the Wax trucker hat, 10 Wax Logo decals and Reward #1 Private Beta Access... for just $45! (add $10 for international shipping)

Sponsorship Bronze Package: 100x100 pixel image under sponsors on our home page until January 1, 2013. Your logo will appear as a sponsor in all of our video updates (youtube). Have the opportunity to be one of the first brands to sponsor challenges on the Wax App.
Picture frame of you and the Wax team. Your support means the world to us and we want you to have a picture to show that you were part of something great. You also get private beta access to Wax.

Sponsorship Silver Package: 150x150 pixel image under sponsors on our home page until January 1, 2013. Your logo will appear as a sponsor in all of our video updates (youtube). Have the opportunity to be one of the first brands to sponsor \r\nchallenges on the Wax App.

Sponsorship Gold Package: 200x200 pixel image under sponsors on our home page until January 1, 2013. Individually mentioned in all of our video updates (youtube). Have the opportunity to be one of the first brands to sponsor challenges on the Wax App.
